survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Online Grocery Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and satisfaction levels regarding online grocery delivery services, including delivery speed, product quality, and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the options cover a broad range of usage frequencies to capture diverse consumer behavior.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which factors are most important to you when selecting an online grocery delivery service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow respondents to select multiple options to identify top priorities.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question; use checkboxes with a maximum of 3 selections.

script.question_text: Which factors are most important to you when selecting an online grocery delivery service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your most recent online grocery delivery experience? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question; use radio buttons with a numbered scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your most recent online grocery delivery experience? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery delivery services?
